definitions.definition: Synonym of handwriting or penmanship , one 's personal skill at writing .
Synonym of calligraphy , the art of beautiful writing .
Synonym of autograph , writing in one 's own hand .
Synonym of palmistry , fortune-telling based on one 's hand .

main_definition: Synonym of handwriting or penmanship , one 's personal skill at writing .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of calligraphy , the art of beautiful writing .
Synonym of autograph , writing in one 's own hand .
Synonym of palmistry , fortune-telling based on one 's hand .
